resources.string: Buddha Smriti Park also known as Buddha Memorial Park is an urban park located on Frazer Road near Patna Junction in Patna, India.
Fraser Road, Near Patna Railway Station Patna Junction, Bihar 800001
Takht Sri Patna Sahib also known as Harmandir Sahib, is a Gurdwara in the neighbourhood of Patna Sahib, India.
Takhat Sri Harmandir ji, Patna Sahib, Patna, Bihar 800008.
Sanjay Gandhi Jaivik Udyan is located off Bailey Road in Patna, Bihar, India. The park was opened to the public as a zoo in 1973.
Raj Bhavan, Bailey Rd, Rajbansi Nagar, Patna, Bihar 800001

The Masjid e Jahan Numa, commonly known as the Jama Masjid of Delhi, is one of the largest mosques in India. It was built by the Mughal Emperor Shah Jahan between 1650 and 1656 at a cost of one million rupees.
Jama Masjid Rd, Jama Masjid, Chandni Chowk, New Delhi, Delhi 110006
The Digha–Sonpur rail–road bridge or J.P Setu is a bridge across river Ganga, connecting Digha Ghat in Patna and Pahleja Ghat in Sonpur, Saran district in the Indian state of Bihar
Fraser Road, near Bank Of India, Dak Bunglow, Chauraha, Marwari Campus, Patna, Bihar 800001
Kankarbagh Rd, opposite to anand nath shiv mandir, Bihar 800020.
Pizza restaurant Delivery/carryout chain offering a wide range of pizzas & a variety of other dishes & sides..
Plot No. DS-22, Jagdeva Plaza, Kankarbagh Main Rd, P C Colony, Lohia Nagar, Patna, Bihar 800020
5th Floor, Central Mall, Fraser Rd, Old Jakkanpur, Indira Nagar, Patna, Bihar 800001
Modern lighting gives this eatery with a full bar & a charcoal tandoor a stylish vibe for parties.
6th P & M Nda BasketBall Court Mall Road, Patliputra Kurji Rd, Patliputra Industrial Area, Patna, Bihar 800013
